attributes.action: offer our apologies to Iran for the mistake which may have led to the accidental incursion of Iranian waters by our Navy personel so that any irational action by either government can be avoided.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hope that our sencere apology will lead to the return of our detained troops, people who are friends and family to many, and that our government will not take action that will result in any kind of militay action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
